name: CrowdFund Buzz
tag_list: crowdfunding, promotions, pr, publicity, kickstarter, seo, social-media, indiegogo
description: Bring the crowd to crowdfunding projects
overview:
Our services are designed to help crowdfunding projects get more visibility. We accomplish this with social media, press and journalist. We can help crowdfunding projects on any platform (Kickstarter, Indiegogo, others) get more exposure and web traffic. These are critical factors to your crowdfunding success. Our services can send hundreds of people who love crowdfunding right to your project.

We are not just media and promotional consultants to crowdfunders. We also have roots in the crowdfunding community. We work closely with both the National Crowdfunding Association (NLCFA) and the Crowdfunding Professional Association (CfPA). We are proud to be part of the process of improving the crowdfunding experience and helping the industry grow.
